img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(85\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/25/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2885%29.png)
On the left, you'll see a **Purple Lingzhi** and a path to take, but there's also one straight up ahead at the edge of the cliff.
img_below_text:
Go straight first, then look for the archer on the lower level to the right. Once you've eradicated the archer, follow the path all the way to the right to find three Revenant Charbones guarding a **Luoija Fragrant Vine**.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(89\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/bd/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2889%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

On the left, you'll see a **Purple Lingzhi** and a path to take, but there's also one straight up ahead at the edge of the cliff."
            - Following Text: "Go straight first, then look for the archer on the lower level to the right. Once you've eradicated the archer, follow the path all the way to the right to find three Revenant Charbones guarding a **Luoija Fragrant Vine**.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(89\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/bd/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2889%29.png)"

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, rocky cliffside path in a forested area, with a red arrow indicating the direction to proceed. The scene is part of a walkthrough for the game "Black Myth: Wukong," guiding players to take the path straight ahead to encounter an archer on a lower level to the right. After dealing with the archer, players are instructed to follow the path to the right to find three Revenant Charbones guarding a Luoija Fragrant Vine. The image serves as a visual aid to help players navigate this specific section of the game.
